about_the_game: Slammer is a free to play, first-person battle royale where players fight to be the last team standing in a massive, 210 player match. Strategize with your 3 person squad and utilize your gun skill to eliminate all the other combatants. Explore the map and gather loot to help give you an advantage over the competition. Rotate to the best possible position using vehicles to make sure you don't get caught in the gas.

content_descriptors.notes: This is a first person shooting game, so there will be realistic depictions of gun fights, explosions, and the gore that comes with that. The participants in the battle royale are convicts with long prison sentences, so there will be mentions of what they did to earn that sentence

short_description: Jump into Slammer and fight to be the last team standing. Pickup your preferred Kit, Loot, and eliminate players in this first person Battle Royale. This game is Cross-Platform capable, so you will be able to play with all your friends regardless if they are on PlayStation, Xbox, or PC.
